Question
========
In a repeated measures ANOVA (Repeated Measures ANOVA), sphericity is one of the assumptions.

Which of the following statements about sphericity is correct?

Answerlist
----------
* In MANOVA, sphericity is an issue.
* With less than three conditions, sphericity is an issue
* The variances of the dependent variable are then not approximately equal in all conditions
* The variances of the difference scores between conditions must then not be of approximately equal size
